import React from 'react' import './BookmarkCard.css' class BookmarkCard extends React.Component { render () { return (
{this.props.bookmark.title.length > 100 ? this.props.bookmark.title.substring(0, 100).concat('...') : this.props.bookmark }
{this.props.bookmark.description.length > 100 ? this.props.bookmark.description.substring(0, 100).concat('...') : this.props.bookmark }
) } } export default BookmarkCard
